content.description: Of the following, which are solutions to the differential equation <math alttext="4 y, plus y double prime, equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>″</mo></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> ?
content.question: <math alttext="y equals, 3 times the sine of, open parenthesis, 2 x, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="y equals, 5 times the cosine of, open parenthesis, 2 x, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="y equals, e raised to the 2 x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.G: Confirm that solutions are accurate and appropriate.
